entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL DB Events collected via DiagnosticSourceEventSource don't include stacks #64020
  • `System.IO.Tests.DirectoryLongerThanMaxLongPathWithExtendedSyntax_ThrowsException` test failing #64019
  • Unify SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES code from FileSystemAclExtensions and SafeFileHandle #64017
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.* work planned for .NET 7 #64015
  • [release/6.0] Always build the ref-pack in servicing #64013
    6.0.x
  • EXC_BAD_ACCESS in DacDbiInterfaceImpl::ResolveExactGenericArgsToken #64011
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer: Validate literal arguments to StringSyntaxAttribute parameters/members #64009
  • [API Proposal]: default state for all objects #64007
  • Inconsistent assembly version for System.Text.Json netstandard2.0 #64003
  • ILVerify false error with array covariance and type parameter #63999
  • Windows service suspension with green leaf #64010
  • Can't build BlazorWebAssembly project #63994
  • Browser wasm on windows CI builds broken #63987
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd_v2/dlbigleakthd_v2.sh #63981
  • EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated invoked before constructor #63979
    7.0.0

Closed

  • ARM64: Redundant movs done for zero extend the register #35254
    Future
  • Invoke_Instance_And_Static_Method_Win32_Process Test failure #64001
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.22057.7] Transmogrify Launch failed with exception about unable to load type 'System.Windows.Media.MILCMD_POP' #63664
  • [Perf] Changes at 12/28/2021 6:18:01 PM #63453
  • Internal API suggestion: bool JitHelpers.IsKnownConstant(uint) to let us optimize certain code paths #11484
    Future
  • Potential optimization for `is ""` #41779
    Future
  • QueueProcessingOrder.NewestFirst WaitAsync should drop the oldest item when the queue is full #62817
    7.0.0
  • Long running test hang: System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.TestCredentialsCopyInAsyncContext #490
    Future
  • JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable is waiting for the entire stream before it starts deserializing #63864
  • RegexNode.ComputeMinLength should do better for some Testref/Testgroup nodes #62723
    7.0.0
  • Json SourceGen tests are not running on .NET Framework #63463
    7.0.0
  • Extend Regex alternation source generator optimization to small sets #62438
    7.0.0
  • Inline depth of 0 causes an assertion during inlining #63942
    7.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.22060.9] UMLGenerator generate unexcepted UML due to Regex.IsMatch return wrong result #63678
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.ILVerification depends on too low version of System.Reflection.Metadata package #63944
    7.0.0
  • Test failure CurrencyNegativePattern_Get_ReturnsExpected_ByLocale in macOS 12 beta 8 #58944
    7.0.0
  • Improve Regex support for automatically making loops atomic #62449
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix OpenSSL version check in GetAlpnSupport #64023
    area-System.Net.Security, test bug
  • Extra tests for assembly name parser. #64022
    area-System.Reflection
  • cut string when substring is smaller than length #64021
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64018
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix invalid threading of nodes in rationalization #64012
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update ComputeHash to remove hash allocations for digest authentication #64005
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Remove Type.MakeGenericType dependency from source generation #64004
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT] new wasm invoke icall with necessary changes from custom marshalers, but no marshalers #63998
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Introduce RandomAccess.SetLength #63992
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for stepper boundary attribute #63991
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • DiscardBufferedData resets preamble when necessary #63990
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Allow generating Dwarf version 5 #63988
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add runtime support for `ref` fields #63985
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add pmi_path argument to superpmi.py script and use it in the superpmi-collect pipeline. #63983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Update NativeAOT codegen and Crossgen2 for CreateSpan #63977
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Retries for flaky WMI test #64008
    area-System.Management
  • Make ILStubGenerated event log ModuleID corresponding to that on other events #63974
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add runtime-extra-platforms pipeline to have matching runtime PR and Rolling builds #62564
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump Explicit-layout value types with no fields to at minimum 1 byte size. #63975
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable hot reload tests for AOT configurations #64006
    area-EnC-mono
  • [Arm64] Don't use D-copies in CopyBlock #63588
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] implement roots on managed stack #63997
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add IsKnownConstant jit helper and optimize 'str == ""' with str.StartsWith('c') #63734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't reuse registers in Debug mode #63698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RateLimiting] Dequeue items when queuing with NewestFirst #63377
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix for Werror=use-after-free in PAL #63954
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOf in StringBuilder.Replace(char, char) #63913
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Disable 2 SMTP tests on checked runtime #63947
    area-System.Net
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json` #63694
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-maui] Take MacCatalyst into account in EnvironmentTests.WorkingSet_Valid test #63996
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Take MacCatalyst into account in EnvironmentTests.WorkingSet_Valid test #63995
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Avoid allocating byte array when setting ALPN list on Linux #63674
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx #63803
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Replace "needs more info" label with "needs-author-action" #63899
    area-Meta
  • Fix profiling objectsallocatedbyclass #63814
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve reductions for Regex empty / nothing nodes #63695
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Extend regex switch alternation optimization to IgnoreCase #63756
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63986
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Fix repeatable failure for max CALLSITE_DEPTH #63966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for StepThroughAttribute #63679
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Address follow-up feedback to CachedCompletedInt32Task #63968
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Reading beyond EOF should return 0 for FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING #63625
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add tests for creating memory mapped files from non-seekable files #63927
    area-System.IO, test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Add support for libraries testing with NativeAOT #63781
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix up warnings from delegate thunks #63980
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add managed implementation of Math/MathF.Abs #63881
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix case where we incorrectly select a prefix as a FindFirstChar optimization when the pattern includdes an alternation that could lead to different prefixes. #63976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Revert "Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops" #63984
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix System.Reflection.Metadata version in ILVerification nuget package metadata #63965
    area-ILVerification
  • Fix Failing Globalization Test on OSX #63971
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Improve ILLink.targets integration #63914
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Do not register ACTIVATION_SIGNAL for secondary PAL copies #63961
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: yet another OSR stress mode #62980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add COMWrappers to crossgen #63969
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • adding centralized location to disable library tests #64024
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix formatting of resource string where excess arguments are passed #63824
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringSyntaxAttribute #62995
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure several helper intrinsics are explicitly marked HW_Flag_BaseTypeFromFirstArg #63972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update StructMarshalling design now that DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute is approved #63765
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IEquatable<T> on value types overriding Equals (and enable CA1066/CA1067) #63690
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed (part 2) #63915
    area-System.Reflection
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #63642
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address-expose locals under complex local addresses in block morphing #63100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63951
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Arm64] Keep unrolling InitBlock and CopyBlock up to 128 bytes #63422
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    blocking, area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Android][libs] Enable Internal.Console.Write in System.Private.CoreLib #63949
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • 'cmeq' and 'fcmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection` #63836
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.UserSecrets` #63700
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Respond to feedback in GenerateMultiTargetRoslynComponentTargetsFile #63943
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Ignore conversion exceptions during dictionary construction #63792
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Tune floating-point CSEs live across a call better #63903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Reverse `ASG(CLS_VAR, ...)` #63957
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Investigative PR for #51961 #63958
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] Added support for non user code attribute #63876
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [WIP]Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Reduce the cost of creating a MemoryMappedFile #63790
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix issues with verify_regions, clear_batch_mark_array_bits. #63798
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Linux and OSX #63945
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL 3 reporting an OutOfMemoryException for missing private key #63955
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Avoid additional local created for delegate invocations #63796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Crossgen2 bug #61104 and add regression test #63956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Check if the child object is in the heap range before get_region_plan_gen_num #63828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Check if the child object is in the heap range before object_gennum #63970
